mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_school_institution_comment( gmt_create, gmt_modify, school_institution_id, username, content, parent_id, to_username )VALUES ( NOW(), NOW(), #{schoolInstitutionId}, #{userName}, #{content}, #{parentId}, #{toUserName} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_school_institution_comment WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, school_institution_id AS schoolInstitutionId, username AS userName, content AS content, parent_id AS parentId, to_username AS toUserName FROM b_school_institution_comment WHERE id = #{id};
